channel.title: [317] C' Bows & Bows, and Magic
channel.description: My C' Bows and My Regular Bows EX: Dark bow attack without arrows and my C' Bows attack like scimitars. Please tell me how to fix this? Also my magic wont autocast, When I weild a staff and click the magic book and click on the spell it does nothing, how do I fix this??
